mapper.select: SELECT USERS.NAME, USER_GRADES.GRADE, SUM(POINT.POINT_CHANGE_VALUE) AS POINT FROM USER_GRADES INNER JOIN USERS ON USER_GRADES.GRADE_UID = USERS.GRADE_UID INNER JOIN MYPAGE ON USERS.USER_UID = MYPAGE.USER_UID INNER JOIN POINT ON USERS.USER_UID = POINT.USER_UID WHERE USERS.USER_UID = #{USER_UID};

SELECT SHIPMENT.RESERVATION_DATE, SHIPMENT.RECIPIENT_PHONE, SHIPMENT.RECIPIENT_NAME, SHIPMENT.DESTINATION_ADDRESS, SHIPMENT.DESTINATION_DETAILADDRESS, SHIPMENT_TYPES.SHIPMENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, MYPAGE.USER_UID FROM MYPAGE INNER JOIN SHIPMENT ON MYPAGE.TRACKING_NUMBER = SHIPMENT.TRACKING_NUMBER INNER JOIN SHIPMENT_TYPES ON SHIPMENT.SHIPMENT_TYPE_UID = SHIPMENT_TYPES.SHIPMENT_TYPE_UID WHERE MYPAGE.USER_UID = #{USER_UID};
SELECT POINT_CHANGE_VALUE, POINT_CHANGE_DATE FROM POINT WHERE USER_UID = 'user2' ORDER BY POINT_CHANGE_DATE DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USER_UID, NAME, PASSWORD, E_MAIL, BIRTH_DATE, POSTALCODE, ADDRESS, DETAILADDRESS, EXTRAADDRESS, JOINDATE, PHONE, MARKETING_RECEIVE_ACCEPTION, GRADE_UID, AUTH_UID) VALUE ( #{USER_UID}, #{NAME}, #{PASSWORD}, #{E_MAIL}, #{BIRTH_DATE}, #{POSTALCODE}, #{ADDRESS}, #{DETAILADDRESS}, #{EXTRAADDRESS}, sysdate(), CONCAT (#{phoneFirst},#{phoneSecond},#{phoneThird}), 'N', #{GRADE_UID}, 'AUTH_U');
mapper.select: SELECT USERS.NAME, USERS.USER_UID, USERS.JOINDATE, USERS.BIRTH_DATE, USERS.PHONE, USERS.E_MAIL, USERS.ADDRESS, USERS.DETAILADDRESS, USERS.EXTRAADDRESS, USER_GRADES.GRADE FROM USER_GRADES INNER JOIN USERS ON USERS.GRADE_UID = USER_GRADES.GRADE_UID;
SELECT * FROM USERS ORDER BY JOINDATE LIMIT 0, 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_USER FROM USERS;
